title: WTB:  Walter Johnson portrait, PSA or SGC
author: bounce

posts.post_title: WTB:  Walter Johnson portrait, PSA or SGC
posts.post_content:
Looking to add a Walter Johnson portrait

Prefer PSA graded, but would consider SGC as well

I'm looking for a "bright" card with good centering that displays nicely, something PSA 4 or less

Not as concerned about corners and no real preference on the back, just want it to look good in the holder

Please post pics of what you've got and asking price, or shoot me a PM
